title: Im a student need help expressing a poem
content: i am designing a poster to express this poem about a windmill. does anyone have any recommendations for fonts which suit the idea of windmills?
author: anonymous

comments.content: oh yeah, it might not be the font that expresses exactly what you want, but the way you use it. something as plain as helvetica could work if your idea is strong.

But please, please, don't use Helvomita.   
Even Comic Sans might be better, or at least less bad.
